sentence: Cook Political Report shifted the race from lean D? to toss up? in December, and one recent general election poll found the governor just one point ahead of her closest opponent, former Detroit Police Chief James Craig.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Michigan Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Trails Republican on Generic Ballot for Governor's Race

author: Arpan Lobo
title: James Craig loses bid to appear on primary ballot after Michigan court denies appeal
